wikipedia_page.main: Reverend Geoffrey Lowrey Speak (史璧琦牧師) OBE (6 October 1924 – 13 March 2000) was a British teacher and educationist to Hong Kong. He served as the ninth principal of St. Paul's College, Hong Kong and first headmaster of Island School.

response: * Geoffrey Lowrey Speak (1924–2000), British teacher in Hong Kong
